projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform featuring real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and an intuitive admin dashboard. Implemented features like cart management, order tracking, and product recommendations.
keyFeatures: Implemented real-time inventory tracking using WebSocket
Integrated Stripe payment processing
Built responsive UI with server-side rendering
Achieved 98% test coverage with Jest and Cypress

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A collaborative task management platform with real-time updates, file sharing, and team communication features. The system includes project timeline visualization, resource allocation, and automated reporting.
keyFeatures: Built real-time collaboration using Socket.io
Implemented drag-and-drop task management
Designed microservices architecture
Containerized application using Docker

projects.title: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A sophisticated analytics platform that leverages machine learning for data visualization and predictive analytics. Features include customizable dashboards, automated report generation, and trend analysis.
keyFeatures: Integrated machine learning models for prediction
Built interactive data visualizations
Implemented real-time data processing
Optimized performance for large datasets

projects.title: Natural Language Processing API
projects.description: A robust API for natural language processing tasks including sentiment analysis, entity recognition, text classification, and language detection. The API is designed for high throughput and accuracy.
keyFeatures: Achieved 92% accuracy on sentiment analysis benchmark
Implemented custom named entity recognition model
Built scalable API serving 500+ requests per second
Deployed using serverless architecture

projects.title: Computer Vision Object Detection
projects.description: A computer vision system for real-time object detection and tracking in video streams. Optimized for edge devices with limited computing resources.
keyFeatures: Implemented YOLOv5 with custom training
Optimized for edge deployment using TensorRT
Achieved 30 FPS on Jetson Nano hardware
Built custom annotation tool for training data
